mapper.insert: insert into my_trade_history values( seq_my_trade_history_rent_no.nextval, #{resNo}, #{pay}, #{borrowerCash}, default, #{deposit}, default, #{lenderCash} )
mapper.select: select * from my_trade_history mth left join booking_reservation br using(res_no) where br.borrower_id = #{id}

select mth.price, mth.deposit, mth.trade_date from my_trade_history mth left join booking_reservation br using(res_no) left join booking using(board_no) where writer = #{lenderId} and status in ('대여중', '대여거부', '반납완료', '분실', '대기')
